summary: Sometimes, we're just waiting for a miracle. A nurse who is a Jehovah's Witness, grows fond of the miracle survivor of a plane crash. Two sexagenarians, a bartender and a parking lot ... See full summary »
cast: Robin Aubert|Marilyn Castonguay|Violette Chauveau|Sarianne Cormier|Xavier Dolan|Anne Dorval|Sylvain Marcel|Julien Poulin|Gilbert Sicotte|Cynthia Trudel|Louise Turcot|Jean-Nicolas Verreault|Valérie Charland|Guillaume Cyr|Rachel Graton|Jasmine Bouchardy Johnson|Alycia Junius-Hérard|Michel Laperrière|Denis Larocque|Nina Lauren|André Lemire|Virginie Morin|Benoit Priest|Hubert Proulx|Gabriel Sabourin|Kwasi Songui|Lili Wexu
title: Miraculum
